/home

I am writing this space to keep building and learning — collecting principles, rules, and study notes as I go. These notes are not complete guides, just reflections and reminders. Over time I hope they grow into something useful for both myself and maybe others.

github · linkedin

achievements

  • Supported 24/7 global operations, assisting with 25+ international on-prem installs.
  • Helped implement monitoring with OpenSearch, improving incident response.
  • Contributed to CI/CD optimization (Azure DevOps & AWS), reducing deploy times.
  • Assisted with SOPs for DR and incident management to enhance reliability.
  • Helped build an end-to-end data flow (collection → processing → visualization).
  • Contributed to deploying & managing 130+ edge modules via Azure IoT Hub.
  • Assisted in developing an internal SDK integrating multi-platform resources.
  • Supported migration from Azure VM to AWS EC2 with minimal downtime.
  • Helped implement single-table design on DynamoDB to improve efficiency.
  • Contributed to Azure & AWS cost-saving initiatives for meaningful reductions.
